title: Field Remedy: 1795
subject:
Engine Z20LET - Turbocharger wastgate
regulation valve defekt
complaint:
Power fluctuation during high load / full
load. No trouble codes stored.
cause:
Turbo charger wastegate regulation valve
internal leakage.
production:
Improved wastegate regulation valves have
been introduced in production as of the following VINÂ´s:
Bochum I W0L0TGF7542184350 (30.04.2004), Antwerp W0L0AHL4845178538
(30.04.2004), Ellesmere Port W0L0AHL4848082282 (30.04.2004),
Bertone W0L0TGF674B007479 (30.04.2004).

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint replace the defective wastegate regulation
valve (part-no.: 55557806 / cataloge-no.: 58 50 129) and install a new one.
It is not necessary to replace the turbocharger.
